name: Not Just Snake
description:
It's (not) just Snake...

What's your best score? Let me know in the comments!

Change DirectionArrows / WASDPause GameESC Key
Do This
  • Catch Fruit to Grow your Tail and Increase your Score.
Not That
  • Don't touch Spikes.
  • Don't touch your Tail.
  • Don't touch Walls.
  • Don't touch Lasers.

I challenged myself to recreate a classic game, adding my own twist, and Twitter voted for Snake!

Follow me on Twitter to keep up with my latest work!

Subscribe to my YouTube Channel for future Game Development content!

Follow my Hashnode Blog and check out my latest article!

"Bleeping Demo" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
